index.title: Özüm'le | Traditional Flavors of Erzincan
index.description: Özüm'le is a family brand that carefully selects traditional Erzincan flavors and brings them to modern tables, preserving recipes passed down through generations.
index.keywords: ozumle, erzincan tulum cheese, butter, cheese, organic erzincan food, natural cheese, traditional erzincan products

urunlerimiz.title: Our Products | Özüm'le Erzincan Flavors
urunlerimiz.description: Discover the unique taste of Erzincan Tulum Cheese. Made with milk from animals fed on highland herbs and crafted using traditional methods, our cheeses bring natural richness to your table.
urunlerimiz.keywords: Erzincan Tulum Cheese, traditional cheese, handmade cheese, natural tulum cheese, regional erzincan products

lezzetimizin-hikayesi.title: The Story Behind Our Flavor | Özüm'le Erzincan Flavors
lezzetimizin-hikayesi.description: We keep the centuries-old tradition of Erzincan Tulum Cheese alive. Discover the story of our cheeses, matured by masters in the clean mountain air.
lezzetimizin-hikayesi.keywords: Erzincan cheese tradition, story of traditional tulum cheese, Anatolian cheese culture, regional food production

hakkimizda.title: About Us | The Özüm'le Family
hakkimizda.description: As the Özüm'le family, we bring flavors from Erzincan’s fertile lands to your table using traditional methods passed down from grandfather to grandchild. Discover our story and values.
hakkimizda.keywords: Ozumle food story, Erzincan family business, traditional production company, local food producer, organic cheese production

kvkk.title: Personal Data Protection | Özüm'le Privacy Policy
kvkk.description: At Özüm'le, the security and protection of your personal data is our top priority. Learn more about our policies under the Personal Data Protection Law (KVKK).
kvkk.keywords: personal data protection, KVKK-compliant e-commerce, customer data security, data protection standards, data privacy in the food sector

satis-sozlesmesi.title: Distance Sales Agreement | Özüm'le Legal Information
satis-sozlesmesi.description: Review our distance sales agreement, clearly outlining your rights and our responsibilities during your purchase.
satis-sozlesmesi.keywords: food product sales agreement, legal consumer rights, e-commerce consumer protection, legal terms for cheese purchases

gizlilik-politikasi.title: Privacy Policy | Özüm'le Legal Information
gizlilik-politikasi.description: We value your privacy at Özüm'le. Read our privacy policy to learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
gizlilik-politikasi.keywords: privacy policy, personal data protection, data security, user privacy, e-commerce privacy policy, customer data protection, Özüm'le privacy

iletisim.title: Contact Us | Özüm'le Contact Information
iletisim.description: For questions, suggestions, or orders, feel free to contact the Özüm'le family. We’d be happy to help you.
iletisim.keywords: Ozumle food contact channels, Erzincan cheese order line, customer service contact, local product order contact

site-haritasi.title: Site Map | Özüm'le Website Guide
site-haritasi.description: Quickly access all pages on the Özüm'le website from one place. Our site map is designed to help you find the information you need easily.
site-haritasi.keywords: Ozumle site map, Erzincan products website navigation, local food site guide, cheese shopping site structure
